Package io.launchowl.viewvalidationlibrary

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Criteria.AsyncCondition<T extends android.view.View>
    An asynchronous condition is a single test that performs an asynchronous operation and then returns a true or false value to the supplied Criteria.AsyncConditionCompletionListener.
    Criteria.Condition<T>
    A condition is a single test that will return true or false.
    Criteria.EvalCompleteListener
    This interface is supplied to the Criteria.evaluate(EvalCompleteListener) method and receives the final validation result after all conditions in a criteria object have been individually tested.
    Validation
    An interface for any class that needs to respond to a validation request.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Criteria<T extends android.view.View>
    This class contains a collection of Criteria.Condition objects.
    Criteria.AsyncConditionCompletionListener
    This class is responsible for notifying the Criteria object that an Criteria.AsyncCondition has completed its evaluation.
    Observer<T extends android.view.View>
    This abstract class is used to observe changes to a View and notify a separate view if the changes are valid.
    Validator<T extends android.view.View>
    This class is responsible for evaluating whether a View is valid.
    ValidatorSet
    This class can be used to evaluate multiple Validator objects.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Validator.ValidationResult
